channel.title: elroyjetson tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from elroyjetson.

item.description: I have tried to like vscode, but just can't. It is slow - clunky. A real lumbering along experience. While I use vim for small tasks, the cognitive load is just too much for it to be my full time editor. I moved back to @sublimehq ST4 is blazing fast.
item.source:markdown: I have tried to like vscode, but just can't. It is slow - clunky. A real lumbering along experience. While I use vim for small tasks, the cognitive load is just too much for it to be my full time editor. I moved back to @sublimehq ST4 is blazing fast.

item.description: Hold on a minute, I have to reboot my HDMI cable.
item.source:markdown: Hold on a minute, I have to reboot my HDMI cable.

item.description: @scottjenson I saw this and couldn't help but share it with you. https://t.co/sby8nycNRz
item.source:markdown: @scottjenson I saw this and couldn't help but share it with you. https://t.co/sby8nycNRz

item.description: @ade_oshineye This article implies it comes from one of the two books listed at the end but I don’t own copies and it doesn’t show up in a Google Books search of them. https://t.co/utpXS1OnJO
item.source:markdown: @ade_oshineye This article implies it comes from one of the two books listed at the end but I don’t own copies and it doesn’t show up in a Google Books search of them. https://t.co/utpXS1OnJO

item.description: When it comes to @GoogleWorkspace once you understand the concept that everything is a link, suddenly you realize how powerful it really is.
item.source:markdown: When it comes to @GoogleWorkspace once you understand the concept that everything is a link, suddenly you realize how powerful it really is.

item.description: @chrisdancy My local weather uses a very similar chart. I am trying to figure out in what world is miserable worse than oppressive! https://t.co/06mR4m8xTh
item.source:markdown: @chrisdancy My local weather uses a very similar chart. I am trying to figure out in what world is miserable worse than oppressive! https://t.co/06mR4m8xTh

item.description: I am always interested in the design of working spaces. I would love to see a followup to this since it was filmed just prior to the pandemic. My guess it is just empty desks. @WSJ @SamsungUS https://t.co/vWx3tkBHMB
item.source:markdown: I am always interested in the design of working spaces. I would love to see a followup to this since it was filmed just prior to the pandemic. My guess it is just empty desks. @WSJ @SamsungUS https://t.co/vWx3tkBHMB

item.description: @GoogleWorkspace In a blog post about Smart Canvas was the mention of Topic-Voting Table Templates. Was this ever rolled out and if so how do you create them? https://t.co/YiAiHzozOU
item.source:markdown: @GoogleWorkspace In a blog post about Smart Canvas was the mention of Topic-Voting Table Templates. Was this ever rolled out and if so how do you create them? https://t.co/YiAiHzozOU

item.description: @davewiner That has always been the best feature really, but this is the problem of focus on growth versus focus on making a really good product. Turns out it is very hard to do both simultaneously.
item.source:markdown: @davewiner That has always been the best feature really, but this is the problem of focus on growth versus focus on making a really good product. Turns out it is very hard to do both simultaneously.

item.description: @davewiner I use a Chromebook quite often and, to be honest, could will probably use it as my full time coding laptop once my current Mac dies. The big thing I have noticed is that you have to update ChromeOS when available or it gets unpredictable.
item.source:markdown: @davewiner I use a Chromebook quite often and, to be honest, could will probably use it as my full time coding laptop once my current Mac dies. The big thing I have noticed is that you have to update ChromeOS when available or it gets unpredictable.

item.description: @mahemoff I am trying to figure out how to add this to my growing collection of future visions tech videos that I have on Plex. I am a sucker for future visions videos.
item.source:markdown: @mahemoff I am trying to figure out how to add this to my growing collection of future visions tech videos that I have on Plex. I am a sucker for future visions videos.
